name: Isibia Dashboard Messages
author: Artem Anoshin

sections.description:
Isibia Dashboard Messages – leave messages in the website control panel for all users. You can leave instructions,
reminders and wish Happy New Year.

Features

  • Creating messages for Admin Panel users
  • The message can be closed or it cannot be closed.
  • You can specify the date period in which the message should be displayed.
sections.changelog:
1.0 (2022-29-12):

  • First version Isibia Dashboard Messages is ready!

short_description: Isibia Dashboard Messages - leave messages in the website control panel for all users.
description:
Isibia Dashboard Messages – leave messages in the website control panel for all users. You can leave instructions,
reminders and wish Happy New Year.

Features

  • Creating messages for Admin Panel users
  • The message can be closed or it cannot be closed.
  • You can specify the date period in which the message should be displayed.

screenshots.caption: You can add messages from the admin bar.
All messages are stored in a separate menu.
This is what the message looks like. It can be made unclosed, as well as output in a certain period of dates.
